name: Circa 1850® Super D Solver Liquid Stripper
description: Circa 1850® Super D•Solver Liquid Stripper quickly and easily strips off multiple layers of oil, latex and epoxy paint; oil and latex varnish; polyurethane; moisture cure; lacquer and shellac. It does not require any afterwash or neutralizing. Safe to use on fine furniture – will not raise wood grain, harm most glue joints or veneers, or damage patina. May soften plastic and fiberglass. Does not contain methylene chloride or NMP.
